isStartEditEnabledForVCA2.expression: ctx.isVariantTableEditing === false && ctx.variantConditionContext.variantFormulaEditInProgress !== true && commandContext.vcaEditState.getValue().vcaEditInProgress !== true && ctx.editInProgress !== true

isAnySelectionSupportedOnFamily.expression: conditions.isFamilyOptional === true && ctx.fscContext.guidedMode === false && conditions.isBooleanFamily === false && conditions.isSingleSelectFamily === true

isNoneSelectionSupportedForManualMode.expression: conditions.isFamilyOptional === true && ctx.fscContext.guidedMode === false && conditions.isBooleanFamily === false && conditions.isSingleSelectFamily === true

isNoneSelectionSupportedForGuidedMode.expression: conditions.isFamilyOptional === true && ctx.fscContext.guidedMode === true && conditions.isSingleSelectFamily === true && conditions.checkIfFamilySelectionIsAllowedInGuidedMode === true

Pca0IsStartTableEditAllowed.expression: conditions.Pca0IsEditInProgressInTableOrTreeWithSummary && conditions.Pca0IsEditAccessGranted && ctx.visibleServerCommands.Awp0StartEditTable && ( ctx.search && ctx.search.totalFound !== undefined ? ( ctx.search.totalFound > 0 ) : true) && ctx.TABLE_CONTEXT.canEdit
